TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WS2007FederationHttpBinding extends System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding

summary.span: 一个安全且可互操作的绑定，它派生自 并支持联合安全性。

span.span: A secure and interoperable binding that derives from and supports federated security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 联合是一种可以在多个企业或信任域通过共享标识进行身份验证和授权的功能。Federation is the ability to share identities across multiple enterprises or trust domains for authentication and authorization. 它使用 WS-Trust 协议将标识的表示形式从一个信任域映射到另一个信任域。It uses the WS-Trust protocol to map the identity representation from one trust domain to another. 联合 HTTP 绑定支持 SOAP 安全以及混合模式安全，但不支持传输安全。Federated HTTP binding supports SOAP security as well as mixed-mode security, but it does not support transport security. 配置了此绑定的服务必须使用 HTTP 传输。Services configured with this binding must use the HTTP transport. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . > [!NOTE] > 当从一个与生成的 WCF 客户端应用程序调用 WCF 服务生成.net Framework 4.0 时[!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)]或更早版本，将包含的配置文件由 svcutil.exe 生成或从 Visual Studio 添加服务引用在绑定配置的 establishSecurityContext 特性。When calling a WCF service built with.Net Framework 4.0 from a WCF client application built with [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] or earlier, the configuration file generated by svcutil.exe or adding a service reference from Visual Studio will contain the establishSecurityContext attribute in the binding configuration. [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] 运行时无法识别此特性，应用程序将引发 并显示消息“无法识别的特性 establishSecurityContext”。This attribute is not recognized by the [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] runtime and the application will thrown an with the message "Unrecognized attribute establishSecurityContext". 若要解决此问题，请从绑定配置中移除 establishSecurityContext 特性。To workaround this problem, remove the establishSecurityContext attribute from the binding configuration.

param.span: 的值，该值指定在 SOAP 消息和客户端中使用的安全类型。

span.span: The value of that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.

summary.span: 通过绑定所使用的指定安全性类型初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified type of security used by the binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的默认值为 ，该值指定完整性、保密性、服务器和客户端身份验证均使用 SOAP 消息安全提供。The default value of is which specifies that integrity, confidentiality, and server and client authentication are provided using SOAP message security. 这些设置的详细信息均可通过 属性返回的 实例访问。The details of these settings are available from the instance of that is returned by the property.
